tier.item: Vaztares -z oficer sin a ... Ruki vverx! Cheremis
k k rem, wintowk-em wiktem ... sa e officer-em ... sul s
s h o u t .1 S G gun-1SG aimed.1SG t hi s officer-1SG melted.3SG
An officer was sitting in front (of her). I shouted "Hands up" and aimed my
gun. The officer got frightened (literally: melted). (Tuzarov 1987: 68)
